title: Hogcast with Très Bien’s Simon Hogeman
description:
Support the Malmomies! This week the boys are practicing what they preach with Simon Hogeman, the co-founder, designer and buyer of Très Bien, one of the best stores and clothing brands in the world. Simon is tapping in straight from Sweden to talk flow team politics, what has and hasn’t worked during a global pandemic, TB’s best and worse sellers, trailblazing the high/low look, fashion optimism vs. pessimism, how to build out your brand’s own universe and much more on this humble and thoughtful episode of of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
Throwing Fits x Seasons: Use promo code “throwingfits” at checkout or subscribe at http://szns.co/throwingfits
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
